column2: On  representations  made  by  the  President's  Counsel  for  the  Petitioner to  the  Attorney
General, learned Senior State Counsel concedes the application for  bail.

column1: circumstances of the case and also considering the  fact that this Petitioner will be a State

column2: witness  in the  substantive case,  he  is  willing to  agree  with the application  made  by  the
